author: Infobae
title: Ground News - Customs clarified that imported products for personal use cannot yet be entered without paying taxes
text:
Summary by Infobae The agency ratified the validity of the current system that provides for certain franchises for products that travelers enter the country, a rule that the new bill seeks to eliminate. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Infobae Lean Left High Factuality Independent: Daniel Hadad Customs clarified that imported products for personal use cannot yet be entered without paying taxes The agency ratified the validity of the current system that provides for certain franchises for products that travelers enter the country, a rule that the new bill seeks to eliminate.
6 hours ago · C A B A, Argentina Read Full Article

Customs clarified that imported products for personal use cannot yet be entered without paying taxes The agency ratified the validity of the current system that provides for certain franchises for products that travelers enter the country, a rule that the new bill seeks to eliminate.
